item.title: About
item.description: This is the website of the Lesson Basic Economics for Industrial Engineering taught at Grenoble INP Industrial Engineering and Management School. Here you find presentation of my activities

item.title: Basic Economics for IE
item.description: Lessons list This is the website of the Lesson Basic Economics for IE taught at Grenoble INP Industrial Engineering and Management School. First Lesson - 01/10/2020 - Thursday 13:30-16:30 Welcome page of First Lesson To do before Lesson 3: Production Case Study team work Presentation of the team works: Production case study Second Lesson - 05/10/2020 - Monday 12:00-13:30 Material for the Second Lesson

item.title: First Lesson
item.description: Welcome ! This First lesson is the introduction of the Basic Economics Class Main topics are Course organisation Introductory topics in economics Experimentation / Case Study / Exercises First period of the class will use handout Second part will be based on experimentation (see below) After this lesson: Student works Reading the Production Chapters Group work: Case study presentation on production cases - (08/10/2020) Pick a case to study in production between 8.

item.title: Other Classes list
item.description: Here are links to other lessons I have pushed online Basic Economics for IEM Discrete Choice Modelling Smart Analytics for Big Data

item.title: Production Case Study
item.description: After the 1rst lesson - Before 3rd lesson: Student works Reading the Production Chapters Group work: Case study presentation on production cases - (08/10/2020) Pick a case to study in production between 8.1 - 8.13 This is a team work: subscribe on Production Googlesheet for group describtion and topic choice Statements: 3 slides presentation 1 slide: Introduction of the case 1 slide: Defining the economics topics usefull to analyse the case 1 slide: Case analysis: either by graph, model, equation, etc.

item.title: Second Lesson
item.description: Welcome ! This Second lesson is the introduction of the Basic Economics Class Main topics are Market The class will continue to use handout Visio Link to the class Meeting: Basic Economics - 2nd Lesson Time: 5 oct. 2020 11:00 AM Paris Join the Zoom Meeting https://grenoble-inp.zoom.us/j/98107129889?pwd=ZWRNazN2czNtbm9rcElTVExkVWxMdz09 ID : 981 0712 9889 Password: BEIE-SIE Lesson material handout
